name: RoboSamurai
description:
Slash your way through opponents in this fast-paced 3d platformer!

RoboSamurai is a 3rd-person dynamic sword-fighting platformer game about a pink robot with a giant sword/katana. The game is in a developement state and will be released when it's ready. For now you can download Development versions on this page, I'm releasing them when i feel like it (mostly after I complete a certain task of adding a big feature/mechanic). If you want to suggest anything / give feedback, feel free to send me your socials in the comments of this project. Anyhow, enjoy this poorly made itch.io page!

Features at the moment

At the moment the biggest features in the newest Development version:

  • Interpolated player movement;
  • Almost fully animated player;
  • Player abilities such as double-jumping, dashing in midair etc.;
  • Combat including combos and charged attacks;

(NOTICE: Unity has trouble with alt+tabbing while playing a built game. The game may freeze/crash/lock input when alt+tabbing out of the game's window. I'm aware of this fact and searching for a solution. For now, sorry for the inconvenience!)

(NOTICE 2: I only upload windows builds at the moment, but as a matter of fact I'm developing this game on a linux machine (PoP_Os to be exact) and it works perfectly with the latest wine. If more people will find this project/the actual game will have some more features I will start uploading Linux builds - for now tho, wine works fine i guess)
